name: agentprobe-community
description: AgentProbe Community - API and Dashboard monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run build:dashboard
scripts.deploy:dashboard: pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard run export && pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard exec wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:dashboard:staging: pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard run export && pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard exec wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:dashboard:production: pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard run export && pnpm --filter @agentprobe/dashboard exec wrangler deploy --env production

author: AgentProbe Community
